Name: At5TPase1
Function: alter ABA and light signaling, stomatal opening,

Name: At5TPase7/ CVL1
Function: foliar vein patterning, root branching, salt tolerance,

Name: At5TPase11
Expression Patterns: flower, leaf, root, silique, bolt, seedling

Name: At5TPase12
Expression Patterns: pollen grain, leaf and flower (mostly); root, stem and young seedling (weakly)

Name: At5TPase13
Function: cotyledon vein development, alter auxin, ABA, sugar and PHOTOTROPIN1 signaling, root gravitropism,

Name: At5TPase15/ FRA3
Expression Patterns: seedling, stem, root, flower, mature leaf (weak)
Function: secondary wall synthesis and actin organization

Name: SAC1/FRA7
Expression Patterns: ubiquitous, predominant in vascular tissues and fibers of stems
Function: cell morphogenesis, cell wall synthesis, actin organization

Name: SAC8/ AtSAC1a
Expression Patterns: hypocotyls of seedlings, pollen grain, most

Name: AtSAL1/ AtFIERY1 (AtFRY1)/ HOS2/RON1
Function: alter ABA, auxin and stress signaling (cold, drought, salt, lithium, high light, cadmium), venation patterning

Name: IMP/VTC4
Function: seed development, ascorbate biosynthesis, alter cold, salt and ABA responses

Name: PTEN2a
Substrates: PtdIns3P, PtdIns(3,4)P2, PtdIns(3,5)P2, PtdIns4P, PtdIns(3,4,5)P3, phosphotyrosin
